notesStmt.note: Reissued in 1677 as: The lives of ten excellent men.
The fifth and last part of Barksdale's series of Memorials of worthy persons.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

(from t.p.) I. Dr. John Reynolds -- II. Mr. Richard Hooker -- III. Dr. William Whitaker -- IV. Dr. Andrew Willet -- V. Dr. Daniel Featley -- VI. Walter Norban, Esq. -- VII. Mr. John Gregory -- VIII. Bishop Duppa -- IX. Archbishop Bramhall -- X. Bishop Taylor.
